page.meta_description: Custom Meshtastic firmware builds web installer
page.main_description: Install custom Meshtastic and Meshcore firmware on your devices using web tools.

selectdevice.filter_placeholder: Type to filter or click to select...
selectdevice.no_versions_available: No versions available for this device

pinout.title: Pinout Diagram
pinout.no_data: No pinout data available for this device
pinout.disclaimer: Information on this page may be unreliable, check source code for details.
pinout.search_placeholder: Search by pin name or number...

firmwareinfo.title: Firmware Information
firmwareinfo.select_device_view: Select a device to view details
firmwareinfo.select_device_instructions: Select a device and firmware version to view detailed information and installation instructions.
firmwareinfo.alternative_download_desc: Use download buttons to get firmware files for manual flashing.
firmwareinfo.uf2_download_desc: Download UF2 file and copy to your device when in bootloader mode.
firmwareinfo.device_bootloader_desc: Double-click reset button or use reset pin to enter bootloader mode.
firmwareinfo.uf2_rp2040_desc: Download UF2 file and drag-and-drop to the RP2040 when in bootloader mode.
firmwareinfo.enter_bootloader_desc: Hold BOOTSEL button while connecting USB to enter bootloader mode.
firmwareinfo.download_firmware_desc: Use appropriate download button for your device type.
firmwareinfo.follow_instructions_desc: Refer to your device's manual for specific installation steps.
firmwareinfo.important_warning: ‚ö†Ô∏è Important: This will replace your current firmware.
firmwareinfo.backup_warning: Make sure to backup any important data before proceeding with installation.

downloadbuttons.download_ota_firmware: Download OTA firmware file for update over-the-air
downloadbuttons.download_nrf_erase: Download NRF Erase file for memory erasing. Don't forget to confirm erasing in serial console!
downloadbuttons.download_uf2_firmware: Download UF2 firmware file for manual installation
downloadbuttons.download_complete_archive: Download complete firmware archive for manual installation
downloadbuttons.esp_web_tools_desc: ESP Web Tools allows you to install firmware directly in your browser without any additional software.
downloadbuttons.connect_device: Connect your ESP32 device to your computer via USB
downloadbuttons.click_connect: Click "Connect" in the ESP Web Tools interface
downloadbuttons.wait_complete: Wait for the installation to complete
downloadbuttons.custom_firmware_description: Flash your own firmware file to ESP devices

notes.beta_version: Beta version - Use at your own risk
notes.disclaimer_text: This service is provided as-is without any warranty. The developers are not responsible for any damage to devices or data loss.
notes.terms_agreement: By using this service, you agree to these terms and acknowledge the risks involved.
notes.howto_coming_soon: Content coming soon... (depend on selected device)
notes.build_variants_desc: Not all board-version combinations are built. Open an issue on GitHub to request specific variants.
notes.language_builds_desc: Builds with "-ru" include Russian language support. Similar patterns exist for other languages.
notes.daily_builds_desc: Builds ending in ".daily" are created from master branch, built 4 times daily at 5:00, 11:00, 17:00, 23:00 GMT.
notes.custom_boards_desc: Custom board configurations are available. Submit issues or PRs via GitHub.
notes.source_code_desc: Firmware is built from official Meshtastic source with only build/variant modifications applied.
notes.backup_config_desc: Always backup your device configuration before flashing new firmware.
notes.battery_level_desc: Ensure your device has sufficient battery charge or is connected to power during installation.
notes.stable_connection_desc: Maintain a stable USB connection throughout the firmware installation process.
notes.recovery_mode_desc: Know how to enter recovery/bootloader mode for your specific device model.
notes.read_documentation_desc: Consult your device documentation for specific installation instructions and requirements.
notes.if_encounter_issues: If you encounter issues with these firmware builds, please:
notes.verify_firmware_variant: Verify you're using the correct firmware variant
notes.report_issues: Report issues on the relevant GitHub repository

importantnotice.title: ‚ö†Ô∏è Important Notice
importantnotice.unofficial_builds: These are unofficial builds of Meshtastic firmware, provided for testing and development purposes. They may contain experimental features and are not officially supported by the Meshtastic project.
importantnotice.backup_before_flashing: Always backup your device configuration before flashing firmware.
importantnotice.old_flasher_available: ‚ö†Ô∏è The old flasher version will be available at https://mrekin.duckdns.org/oldflasher/ until 01.02.2026

footer.installer_description: Installer powered by advanced web-based tools for firmware development and installation:
footer.alternative_endpoints: Alternative service endpoints for improved accessibility and performance:
footer.trademark_notice: Meshtastic¬Æ is a registered trademark. All other trademarks are the property of their respective owners.
footer.new_year_greeting: May the New Year bring you joy, health, and good luck! Thank you for using our service. üéÑ‚ú®

customfirmware.drag_drop_file: Drag & drop your firmware file here
customfirmware.step1_connect: Connect your ESP device to your computer via USB
customfirmware.step3_flash: Click "Flash Firmware" to start the flashing process
customfirmware.put_device_download: Put device in download mode (hold BOOT0/FLASH button while pressing reset, or double-tap reset on ESP32-S2/S3)
customfirmware.important_device_bootloader: Important: Device must be in bootloader/download mode for flashing
customfirmware.file_conflict_error: Cannot flash firmware and factory firmware simultaneously. Use only one file type. Factory firmware contains bootloader, partitions, firmware.
customfirmware.unknown_validation_error: An unknown file validation error occurred.

backupconfirm.title: Save Device Flash Dump?
backupconfirm.warning: Reading the entire memory may take some time. Do not disconnect the device during the process.

memorymap.overlap_warning: Memory segments overlap! This may cause flashing errors.

settings.title: Settings
settings.minimal_interface_description: Show only essential components for device flashing
